Song.title: Good And Gracious
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Rich Gunderlock & Bob Kauflin © 2009 Sovereign Grace Worship/Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Chorus: [A]Good and gracious, You’re our Creator [D]Good and gracious, to all You’ve made You’re [F#m]good and gracious, You never change There’s [G]goodness [D] in everything You [A]do [| A]
Verse 1: [A]Father, [A/G]You are [D]powerful and mighty [D C] [A]You rule [A/G]over [D]everything our eyes see [D C] [D]You provide the air that we [E]breathe [D]Sun and rain and food that we [E]eat [F#m]You’re so good to [Bm]always take care of [E]me [| D C]
Verse 2: [A]Father, [A/G]You sent [D]Jesus down to save us [D C] [A]He’s the [A/G]greatest [D]gift You’ve ever gave us [D C] [D]When the Spirit opens our [E]eyes [D]We can see the goodness of [E]Christ [F#m]Then we find we [Bm]want to do good like [E]You [| D C]
Arrangement.searchtext: chorus good and gracious youre our creator good and gracious to all youve made youre good and gracious you never change theres goodness in everything you do verse 1 father you are powerful and mighty you rule over everything our eyes see you provide the air that we breathe sun and rain and food that we eat youre so good to always take care of me verse 2 father you sent jesus down to save us hes the greatest gift youve ever gave us when the spirit opens our eyes we can see the goodness of christ then we find we want to do good like you
